  • Solution (pyrit.solution)
  • View page source

Solution (pyrit.solution)

This module is responsible for managing a problem’s solution.

This module contains a variety of solution classes. They are categorized in the same was as the problem classes are. There are the categories Electric solutions, Magnetic solutions, Thermal solutions and Current flow solutions.

Furthermore, there are Abstract solution classes, Field plotter and Miscellaneous.

Electric solutions

ElectricSolutionCartStatic(description, ...)

The solution of an electrostatic problem in 2D Cartesian coordinates.

ElectricSolutionAxiStatic(description, ...)

The solution of an electrostatic problem in axisymmetric coordinates.

Magnetic solutions

MagneticSolutionCartStatic(description, ...)

Solution of a static, two-dimensional magnetic problem in Cartesian coordinates.

MagneticSolutionCartHarmonic(description, ...)

Solution of a harmonic, two-dimensional magnetic problem in Cartesian coordinates.

MagneticSolutionCartTransient(description, ...)

Solution of a transient, two-dimensional magnetic problem in Cartesian coordinates.

MagneticSolutionAxiStatic(description, ...)

Solution of a static, two-dimensional magnetic problem in axisymmetric coordinates.

MagneticSolutionAxiHarmonic(description, ...)

Solution of a harmonic, two-dimensional magnetic problem in axisymmetric coordinates.

MagneticSolutionAxiTransient(description, ...)

Solution of a transient, two-dimensional magnetic problem in axisymmetric coordinates.

Thermal solutions

ThermalSolutionCartStatic(description, ...)

The solution of a two-dimensional, stationary heat conduction problem in Cartesian coordinates.

ThermalSolutionCartHarmonic(description, ...)

The solution of a two-dimensional, harmonic heat conduction problem in Cartesian coordinates.

ThermalSolutionCartTransient(description, ...)

The solution of a two-dimensional, transient heat conduction problem in Cartesian coordinates.

ThermalSolutionAxiStatic(description, ...)

The solution of a stationary heat conduction problem in axisymmetric coordinates.

ThermalSolutionAxiHarmonic(description, ...)

The solution of a harmonic heat conduction problem in axisymmetric coordinates.

ThermalSolutionAxiTransient(description, ...)

The solution of a transient heat conduction problem in axisymmetric coordinates.

Current flow solutions

CurrentFlowSolutionCartStatic(description, ...)

The solution of a two-dimensional stationary current problem in Cartesian coordinates.

CurrentFlowSolutionCartHarmonic(description, ...)

The solution of a two-dimensional, harmonic electroquasistatic problem in Cartesian coordinates.

CurrentFlowSolutionCartTransient(...[, ...])

The solution of a two-dimensional, transient electroquasistatic problem in Cartesian coordinates.

CurrentFlowSolutionAxiStatic(description, ...)

The solution of a stationary current problem in axisymmetric coordinates.

CurrentFlowSolutionAxiHarmonic(description, ...)

The solution of a harmonic electroquasistatic problem in axisymmetric coordinates.

CurrentFlowSolutionAxiTransient(description, ...)

The solution of a transient electroquasistatic problem in axisymmetric coordinates.

Abstract solution classes

Solution(description, solution, mesh, ...)

Abstract solution class.

StaticSolution(description, solution, mesh, ...)

A general, static solution.

HarmonicSolution(description, solution, ...)

A general, harmonic solution.

TransientSolution(description, solution, ...)

A general, transient solution.

Field plotter

Classes for plotting static, harmonic and time dependent fields on triangular meshes.

FieldPlotter(tri_mesh)

A class to generalize the plotting of fields on triangular meshes

StaticFieldPlotter(tri_mesh)

A field plotter for static fields.

HarmonicFieldPlotter(mesh, frequency)

A field plotter for harmonic fields.

TransientFieldPlotter(tri_mesh)

A field plotter for transient solutions.

Miscellaneous

VectorConverter()

Convert vectors for axi meshes of different types.
